title: Ep 003: Oak and Wine - What’s the big deal?
itunes:title: Oak and Wine - What’s the big deal?
description:
Elizabeth and Rick cover everything you ever wanted to know about oak and its influence on wine, and then some. Plus, we define a few fancy wine terms to throw around at your next dinner party.

Show Notes:

  • News - New Zealand sets a lofty goal
  • Shout out to Bosman van der Merwe
  • Oak - The what, why, and how
  • Flavor profiles, aging, and the good vs. bad uses of oak Some fun wine terminology
  • Grape of the Week: Pinot Gris / Pinot Grigio Elizabeth’s radical proposition for Pinot Gris Differences in flavor profiles for Pinot Gris and Pinot Grigio (lemon water, anyone?)
  • Next week: Trendy wines

Sponsored by the free Hello Vino mobile app (iPhone & Android) More at the Wine for Normal People blog
